tool.name: odgi viz
tool.command: odgi viz -i '$input' --out='$output' -x $width -y $height #if str($path_height) --path-height=$path_height #end if #if str($path_x_padding) --path-x-padding=$path_x_padding #end if $path_per_row #if str($link_path_pieces): --link-path-pieces=$link_path_pieces #end if --threads=\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}

param.label: Width in pixels of output image
Height in pixels of output image
Display a single path per row rather than packing them
Show thin links of this relative width to connect path pieces

tool.help:
optimized dynamic genome/graph implementation (odgi) ----------------------------------------------------
variation graph visualizations (viz)
